sentences.en: Ade is going to lick his wound.
He gave the bowl a thorough lick.
sentences.cn: 他把饭碗舔得一干二净.

sentences.en: He gave the stamp a lick.
He might be able to lick us all in a fair fight.
sentences.cn: 如果公平较量，他也许能将我们所有人都轻易打败。

sentences.en: He'll lick the shoes of anyone to get what he wants.
sentences.cn: 为了满足自己的需求,他会奉承任何人.

sentences.en: He's going to lick his wounds.
I think we could lick the best teams there.
sentences.cn: 我想我们能打败那儿最好的队.

sentences.en: If you lick me, you may take what money I have.
sentences.cn: 如果你赢我, 你可拿走我所有的钱.

sentences.en: Kevin wanted a lick of Sarah's lollipop.
sentences.cn: 凯文想舔一下萨拉的棒棒糖.

sentences.en: My room needed a lick of paint to freshen it up.
sentences.cn: 我的房间只要刷一点油漆就能焕然一新。

sentences.en: She wanted her boyfriend to lick her boots all the time.
sentences.cn: 她想让她的男朋友总是奉承她.

sentences.en: The dog jumped up and licked her face.
sentences.cn: 那只狗跳起来舔她的脸。

sentences.en: The house would look better with a lick of paint.
sentences.cn: 这房子稍加颜色就好看了.

sentences.en: the political organization he worked for was licking its wounds after electoral defeat.
sentences.cn: 他所在的政治组织在竞选失利后正在休养生息，以图恢复元气。

sentences.en: The waves lick at the seawall.
They've been trying hard to lick their wounds these years.
sentences.cn: 这几年,他们一直在努力求得失败后的复原.

sentences.en: They've been trying to lick their wounds these years.
sentences.cn: 这几年,他们一直在努力地重整旗鼓.

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)草率从事（尤指清洗工作）
草率的努力：草率地或毫无热情地做出的表面上的努力
使成形，使象样：把某物整理好或使某物外形美观
急切地盼望；（对…）馋涎欲滴
（失败或受辱后）休养生息，养精蓄锐，恢复元气

trans.tran_en: when you move your tongue across the surface of something
to move your tongue across the surface of something in order to eat it, wet it, clean it etc
to move your tongue across the surface of something in order to eat it, wet it, clean it etc
to move your tongue across the surface of something in order to eat it, wet it, clean it etc
